levelList.name: Vengeance awaits you all!
levelList.desc:
Deal +10% damage ตามทุก ๆ 2 [MiddleFingerBook] on the target (สูงสุด 50%)
[BeforeAttack] At 40% or less HP, ได้รับ Atk Weight +1
[WhenUse] If the main target has [MiddleFingerBook], convert all Coins on this Skill to [SuperCoin]s
[WhenUse] แต้มเหรียญ +1 ตามทุก ๆ 3 enemy with [MiddleFingerBook] (สูงสุด 2)
[WhenUse] แต้มแคลชสกิล +1 ตามทุก ๆ 2 [MiddleFingerBook] on the main target (สูงสุด 5)
[EndSkill] If this unit killed a target with [MiddleFingerBook], ได้รับ 1 [PlusCoinValueUp] ในเทิร์นถัดไป (2 times per turn)
[EndSkill] Remove [MiddleFingerBook] on all targets that were hit
